Multi-user Capabilities: Introducing a feature that enables multiple people to print from their devices on the same machine without the need for a central device.
Mobile App Integration: Developing an app that allows users to access and control printing remotely via their smartphones.
3D Printing: Adding a feature to print physical objects in 3D.
Eco-friendly Ink: Using more sustainable and environmentally-friendly inks for both standard and color prints.
Personalization Features: Incorporating customizable designs and text options to allow users to personalize their prints.
